page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: {Yard and school games. At playtime we play Bull-dogs and Longball.In Longball there is a bowling team and a batting team.The batting person runs and the bowlers have to try and hit the batter on his/her leg with the ball. In Bull-dogs two people are choosen to go in the middle.They then choose between them a person to try and make a'bulldog' by running across the pitch.The people in the middle have to try and stop the runner by picking them up.If they get through then the runner shouts: "Bull_dogs!".We also play Polo,Chaingame,5-10 and other odd games. In 'Polo' there is one person who says:"All different kinds of flowers" or some other subject.Then some people at the other end choose a flower,and the guesser also has to choose the name of a flower (contd.)
